mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO( USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS ) VALUES( SEQ_USNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE, STOP_DATE, WITHDRAWAL_DATE, FORCE_DATE, USER_STATUS FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND (USER_STATUS = 'Y' OR USER_STATUS = 'P')
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, USER_BIRTH = #{userBirth}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}, USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
